website_summaries.verdict: They offer both versatile sling-back style and a reasonable price, but they are lacking in comfort and quality.
pros: A combination of affordable elegance with a timeless sling-back style
These 4-inch heels are available in attractive colors and patterns that include faux croc and snakeskin
cons: Made of synthetic material that some owners say resembles plastic
They run narrow and don't provide a comfortable fit for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Super elegant and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. So far I've bought this style in three different colors and will buy more for sure. They look so elegant, the heel is high but you don't feel it. Having said that I find the nude ones more comfortable than the black ones. Even though they are same style and same size the black ones feel tighter. I usually wear size 6 however I have wide feet so I order 6.5 and they fit great. I have worn these shoes to work all day as well as to go out and they haven't hurt a bit and I usually have problems with shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish heels
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of these sling backs! I was looking everywhere for a nice white heel and I am not disappointed. I almost always wear an 8.5 in heels, but I viewed the product measurements and realized they run small, so I ordered a 9 and they fit perfectly. I'm giving these shoes a 4/5 because they are slightly uncomfortable, I wouldn't wear them for an 8 hour work day; but they are great for a few hours. In all I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eben Visher

customer_reviews.title: "Not worth it"
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because off the reviews I read about people loving them. I didn't expect that they would be the best quality for the price I paid for them, but hoped they would be of average quality and fun to wear. Unfortunately the quality was very cheap and the shoes were so uncomfortable to wear I could only wear them for a few minutes. The heel is way too high and the toes too narrow and short, so the height of the heel pushes your foot forward into the short narrow toe and pinches your toes. I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I love them and are used to them
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I realize that high heels aren't for everyone, but I love them and are used to them. So the VERY high and narrow heel doesn't faze me, so keep that in mind when you read this review! These shoes are a STEAL for the price. They arrived in perfect condition, carefully protected. I ordered the brown, and it is a lovely shade. Really classy. I am a size 9.5 and these fit perfectly. No pinching in the toes. I plan to buy more. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Land

customer_reviews.title: they are cute
customer_reviews.text: I was perfect .. I'm 8 1/2 and that was the one I chose. The material is not of quality ... it will be damaged soon. But they are cute ... I hope they last a little.
customer_reviews.author: limb

customer_reviews.title: Unexplainably horrible! Wish I could give a -5
customer_reviews.text: I just received these about 20 minutes ago. Didn't even try them on before taking these pictures. There is some type of glue all over the shoes. One heel was already scuffed. There is a massive amount of extra material in one of the shoes. I also used their size guide and the shoes are a size too small. I wanted to wear these for my anniversary dinner because this is our wedding color. So incredibly angry! I usually give really good reviews. But this one has me stumped for positive words.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough; Noticeable Improvement Needs When Immediately Worn
customer_reviews.text: Too short for toe expansion when standing. Fits tight around heel. Be aware of this for regular, thick, wide heels on feet. Strap adjustments may help. Otherwise color as shown online, fabric (faux suede) good for wear and cleaning with no damage if careful/appropriate cleaning. Heels sturdy but narrow enough to warn, be careful walking (especially outdoor). Would be better for wearing if they were made 1/4 - 1/2 inch longer to current available sizes for toes to extended as should but without dangerous movement in shoes. Warning for thick and or wide feet, high arches, thick, abnormal toes...
customer_reviews.author: Dee Greatest

customer_reviews.title: PrettyHeels!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shoe, very good quality, heel a little high have not worn yet , so I cant say how comfortable they are. However I would recommend, if you like high heels.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I love buying Amazon shoes. Almost every purchase has been fantastic. This was an exception. I got the snakeskin ones, and these shoes looked cheap beyond words. They didn't fit well, and the print doesn't match up with the coloring. I don't know how to explain it other than that it looked horrible. I'm sure the shoes would be fine in a single color, but the snakeskin should not be an option you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I wear heels all day for days at a time and these shoes are the most painful. If I am literally walking in a sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected and are so classy, and sexy. I cannot walk in them for more than 5 seconds without my toes hurting because they are being pushed into the front. I wear heels all day for days at a time and these shoes are the most painful. If I am literally walking in a sitting down I would still probably not wear them. I will try to get used to them because I did buy them.
customer_reviews.author: CierraB

customer_reviews.title: Too small and bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6.5 but I got the size 7 based on the reviews. This size 7 was so small I couldn’t even pull the strap up. I probably would need a size 8.5 to get my size 6.5 foot in the shoe. And the company has nerve to change $4.95 to return the shoe? I wanted to exchange them because they are really cute but after seeing that charge I’m over it. Do not buy these shoes! Not worth the hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack

customer_reviews.title: Too SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: (ROSE GOLD)looked like they were spray painted & they ran A WHOLE SIZE SMALLER! I ordered other 2 other Colors and they were PERFECT in Every way for ME! The last 3 Pairs I received weren’t Fitting and the Colors weren’t great! I returned them and I Being CHARGED for Shipping one 1 pair(ROSE GOLD) I’m not Happy bcuz I’m a PRIME member and I only had them 1 Day & Shipped them back!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have very narrow feet (AAA) and the fit was perfect fore me. Ordered 7.5 wear 7.5 perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the fit was as described, narrow enough to be snuggled on my feet without being to tight to stand in for long periods. Which is why I have two pair of these shoes. I wear them everywhere (church, out to dinner, out with friends and etc.). I only wish I could find open toe shoes as narrow for my toes, but so far if they are described as narrow, they maybe but not narrow enough to prevent my feet from sliding and toes hanging over the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Arg

customer_reviews.title: Classy Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I do like these shoes. After reading the reviews, I expected them to run small. So no real surprise there. I just skip the salty snacks prior to wearing them. I purchased the white ones because it has been difficult to find an all white shoe that is classy. Now, I am simply getting in as many wears as I can before Labor Day. I know, I know. I'm the last person on Earth to abide by the, "White is in on Easter. And out on Labor Day" fashion rule. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: T. W.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color, Bad Fit
customer_reviews.text: I am not pleased at all! I’ve been looking forward to receiving my black patent leather slingbacks and excitedly opened my box to find a very distasteful coffee pu! I told myself if they fit MAYBE I’ll keep them if they grew on me but that is a complete no go! They don’t fit nor are they appealing in any way! Poorly made awkward fit as though on the wrong feet. I have no use for them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Run really small and very stiff
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these shoes as they are gorgeous but they are very stiff and not comfortable run small and I ordered up due to other reviews. I am a seasoned high heel wearer I wear 3-4inch heels 6 days a week and walk around 4-5 miles a day in an office and in less than an hour in these and my knees and feet were really hurting. Shame because they are beautiful probably won’t wear them again :(
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Glittery but wasn't Gold!
customer_reviews.text: So, I read tons of reviews prior to buying. I expected a faux leather snake skin pattern nude sling back. Upon arrival, the shoe is actually a cloth type material with the "snake skin" pattern. It is very unstable feeling on the foot under normal walking pressure. I'd rather pay what it might cost for the "real deal", something made sturdily with real leather. Good luck, some women may not mind at the price for the "looks", I do. Sending right back for full refund. Something's you just can't cut corners on 👌
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Professional, Modern
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are so comfortable! I've received several compliments on them already. The black croc pattern is gorgeous. I can wear them all day without pain. Sling-backs don't cause the typical blisters closed-heel shoes cause. I am typically either an 8.5 or 9 so I ordered the 9 and they were a perfect fit. I wouldn't order smaller. You can adjust the strap to tighten if necessary. Really happy with this purchase and can't wait to get a few more pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: True to size, great vibrant color, and so affordable
customer_reviews.text: These run very true to size, very generously, so much so that you could get away with going a half size down if the color you want isn't available in your regular size. They are very comfortable for being so high. The price is excellent; planning to get several more fun colors since they're so reasonably priced and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Person

customer_reviews.title: STRONG chemical smell that does not ever fade.
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE SMELL. I've let these air out for more than a month and they still smell like turpentine (no exxageration). I can't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Order at least a 1/2 size larger. This particular shoe was not visually appealing, at all. It looked very cheaply made. The design looked like a sticker. I have them in a couple of colors. The black and cream snakeskin are very comfortable. It seems as though the size and fit varies by color. Make sure you try them on immediately if not you’ll miss the window to exchange or get a refund. I purchased 2 colors to wear at a later date and never tried them on. Unfortunately I am now stuck with shoes that I can’t wear or in this case, just don’t like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are actually really comfortable. I have never worn this brand before so ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are actually really comfortable. I have never worn this brand before so I was unsure if I would like them. They are pretty soft and I didn't have to break them in. The heel isn't too high either.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: I love the style n it fits
customer_reviews.text: I love the style n it fits. It's the same as picture but the only problem is the back of the shoe strip is keep slipping. I didn't try it on before so when I wore it on my sis's wedding me walking as a bridesmaid in front of peoples n the shoe was kept slipping that was terrible n embarrassing memory. Overall it's cute n I would love it more if didn't slipping off.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Try them....
customer_reviews.text: The shoe style and color is pretty. However, it's a super cheap disposable shoe. Wear once and your done. They also come about a full to 2 sizes smaller. I ordered an 8.5 and it was super tight on me. I usually wear a 7.5. I will reorder in a 9 as I like the style and color and only plan on wearing them once.
customer_reviews.author: E.B

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend if you have a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and the shoes fit but on the narrow side. I purchased size 7.5 which is my regular size. My big toes went numb if I wore them too long. I received compliments on how pretty the shoes looked. I just wished they fit a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Rosio Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: On behalf of my gf, these were not great. Depending on the shoe she is 7.5 to 8. First tried the 7.5, wayyyy too small. Returned no problem. Ordered the 8, still too small and refund is taking forever. Shoes are sexy and nice but run wicked small.
customer_reviews.author: EStats13

customer_reviews.title: Order a full size up
customer_reviews.text: If you ordered this product in the past, order a size up now. They have changed this shoe, but for the better. They added a cushion, and the toe box is more pointed, and prettier. I ordered these last year, and got an 8, I ordered a new pair in 8.5 and they were too small. So, order a full size up, and they should fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Sexy pair of heels
customer_reviews.text: Love these heels. Not made cheap. Priced just right. True to size. Sexy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but poor quality for the price and wrong sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe but the quality is a bit poor for the price, and the sizing is wrong. Size chart/ measurements aren’t correct. They definitely size small (painful to the toes) so make sure you grab a .5 larger, or a full size larger if planning to use the gel pads. Other than that I love the design.
customer_reviews.author: mjennifergia

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful shoes unfortunately way too small! You beed 1 size up
customer_reviews.author: Fabuleuse

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Too tight at the toes. Order a bigger size. These don't fit even though I ordered my size!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. I wear 71/2 but these are way too tight. There's no way to do an exchange. I can return and pay nearly $5 which will be deducted from my credit card. Ridiculous! I ordered MY size! Their shoes are NOT 7 1/2. Not my fault.
customer_reviews.author: 💎 Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Fit perfect. First day wearing them, I was on my feet for four hours straight and I felt very little discomfort. I was so surprised. I wear heels often but these were as comfortable as any pair I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: MTB37

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes💕💞
customer_reviews.text: I truly love these shoes. They're the perfect color for the dress I've purchased that has the same blue within it. These shoes are not only pretty on, but are very comfortable and I have weird feet. I've unfortunately inherited a bunion on my right foot. So shoes sometimes hurt because of it.😕 Great price point as well$$
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for almost every outfit.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfy, not too steep, and the perfect shade of ‘nude’ (at least for me).
customer_reviews.author: Michi the vegan

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super pretty. I bought the gold/champagne color
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super pretty. I bought the gold/champagne color. They are so comfortable that it feels like I am wearing a slipper or another comfy shoe. They are fine for folks who are used to heels, I don't feel the height at all. I can't wait until my other pairs arrive. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Yetunde

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the trouble
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for these shoes. They look fantastic online but in real life they disappointed. Not only were they a completely different color, ( I had ordered the nude but had received an ugly olive-bike colored pair of shoes), but after reading the reviews about the sizing I ordered a half a size up hoping to fix the issue of the shoes running small but they were still not big enough I would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Awepastorette

customer_reviews.title: Runs a full size small.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 8 to 8.5. 8.5 is always plenty big. I bought 8.5 so they would be bigger and more comfy since they are sling back and I would be able to tighten the strap. These seem to be more like a 7.5. Too small. Sizing is a full size off in my opinion. I know shoes, I own at least 200 pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona S.

customer_reviews.title: Wore them Resurrection Sunday Extremely comfortable with extra padding. I have two additional pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 8.But these run small a 8.5 is a good fit. No heel hanging over. But a little space at heel. I purchased extra pad for ball of feet. Other wise a good shoe for the price. In a timeless style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these did not work. I already had a pair of Riverberry Slingbacks (Gold) and they are awesome, I wear a US 10. I was totally taken aback after receiving these darling shoes because they were so tiny, I could tell before I pulled them out the box. So disappointed as I truly enjoy my others and would have loved to rock these as well :(
customer_reviews.author: Tasha J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking slingback for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with some of the reviews the look of this sling back looks far more expensive than it was. I bought a size 7 true to size in the black snakeskin very nice looking the problem is they are high and the pitch of the shoe pushes you forward and I'm a high heel girl but too hard to walk in. Maybe if I just stand there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They run small!
customer_reviews.text: The fit "Very" snug what every your size is my suggestion is to go half size up. As I had to use shoe stretcher. But received lots of compliments for style.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Shilts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes,and nice white...soft white color
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really pretty and elegant. I have a slightly wide foot,so the shoe is just a tiny bit snug. I think it will be fine though
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Carelessly labeled
customer_reviews.text: Left shoe was way too small. I have never experienced one shoe being smaller than the other. I couldn't even pull the back strap over my heal. I sent them back and will revise my review when new shoe arrives
customer_reviews.author: diane michelle aiken

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are  beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a beautiful beige snake sling back. Their just a tab bit snug on the top of the foot were to snug but Nothing to awful. Once broke in your fine. I've bought another pair which were tge black patent sling back they are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: asha

customer_reviews.title: I generally wear 6 or 6 1/2 but these fit great to allow for my swelling
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fit perfectly, as I have had recent joint replacement surgery in my feet and still have daily swelling even after months. I generally wear 6 or 6 1/2 but these fit great to allow for my swelling. Though the mint color is deeper than the picture shows. I wish they were the exact color. I give them a 4 star because of the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 8 and ordered a beige 8 1/2 pair based on the reviews. When I receive the shoes I was disappointed because they look so cheap, and they were uncomfortable (tight in toe). Of course they are a great price so I didn’t expect Jimmy Choos but I returned them. Everyone has different expectations and comfortability. I thought I could wear them for work but it just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Agasi

customer_reviews.title: Always get compliments
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect pop of color to give an ordinary outfit an edgy. I love wearing them with corals, navy, purple, etc. Not the best quality but they’re cheap so what do you expect really.
customer_reviews.author: SCasher

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7. I should have ordered a size up: 7.5. Other than that they are great heels. The heel is not too high or too low. The colors are nice. I ordered almost every color for this heel. It goes great for work or a night out! With a dress or slacks!
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were too small, not true to size. Nice looking shoes, just to small. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: LaQuita

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I did not put these shoes on at all a nail is sticking out of heel where the back of your foot is sitting in shoe. I returned them also because color is not accurate to pic on website ( shoes need to be inspected before they are shipped)
customer_reviews.author: Binky64

customer_reviews.title: Go a size up.
customer_reviews.text: 😔 I’m really sad because I wanted to wear them. They don’t fit like a 10, they fit like a 9, and I have very narrow feet. The shoes are cute though!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! Stylish...fits well...comfortable I am a 8 1/2 bought the 9B because of how narrow it is and its perfect. The extra heel inserts and cushions was absolutely thoughtful and much needed since I walk alot outside to and from work.
customer_reviews.author: suga brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality Shoes for the Price, Very Comfortable, Expensive-looking!
customer_reviews.text: As a shoe fanatic of many years standing I have worn shoes from every price range up to hand made designer shoes and can honestly say these are AMAZING quality for the price. The snakeskin look more expensive than the plain, the heel is nice and high and for someone with wide feet they are very roomy and comfortable in the toe area which is unheard of personally. The size was spot on, if they had suede I would definitely buy other colors, may get the beige snake ones, very elegant and classy-looking. Arrived dead on time, well done Riverberry!
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe. But my wife had to return them twice....which means she had to go up an entire size. She wears a 71/2 which seem only a little too small. So, she returned them for an 8 and now needs an 81/2. I'm not sure she's going to order them again.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: These run small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair of these and they run small so now I have to return them. I am very disappointed. I shop online because I don’t have time to run around and now I have to take these to the UPS office.
customer_reviews.author: Baiyina Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is very nice and looks as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very nice and looks as pictured. My only issue with this is that the inner lining was put on wrong, so that it his my corner toes, which hurts after wearing it a while. I had to put on some mole skins in order to be able to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Aprilsan28

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Full Size larger!  Length is shorter than normal us size
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the quality I hoped for but I’ll keep them because I’ve been unable to find brown slingback pumps elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Leenie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I love the adjustable back and the fit of the arch. I’m not quite a 7 not quite a 7.5 so I ordered a 7.5 and it fits perfect. Also, they’re so beautiful. I love the color
customer_reviews.author: Ksakievich

customer_reviews.title: Runs extremely small
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is lovely...the color was exactly what I was looking for. However, the shoe runs extremely small...I ordered a 7.5 and I think I probably would need an 8.5...so if purchasing this shoe I would definitely would order a FULL size UP.
customer_reviews.author: Twala Simm

customer_reviews.title: Cheap even by cheap standards. Fit well, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap even by cheap standards. Fit well, but very flimsy. Didn't even attempt to wear them for more than a try since the heel was unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very high heels
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. Don't be fooled by picture these are very high heels. They were comfortable as long as I wasn't walking, I am used to wearing 3"pumps, these feel much higher. Just FYI I did order a 7 when I normally wear 6.5. The 7s are plenty roomy that I could have ordered the normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie San Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Riverberry Red Patent
customer_reviews.text: I love my Riverberry but the nine I ordered was a tight fit..I would like to reorder the same red patent colour in a larger size but I am not getting the colour I want
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Patricia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit
customer_reviews.text: I had to give this shoe to someone because it was too tight and I ordered the right size I was not happy
customer_reviews.author: sandria wiles

customer_reviews.title: The color was way off.
customer_reviews.text: The style is great, however, I am thoroughly disappointed that I bought the mint color shoe and received a color that is a dark aquamarine at best. The color of the shoe on the advertising is not AT ALL the color that I received. I was hoping to wear these bad boys to my wedding but, alas, that is what I get for trusting amazon rather than going to the store. False advertising on color, though. 🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Hello There

customer_reviews.title: Love the pattern and the construction of these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This pair is perfect. When I got it out of the box they looked somewhat smaller than a size 9 (which I ordered), but when they are on, they are perfect. I may have to force the toes a little on the front of the shoe, because I hate the sight of a heel coming out of the back, but they are still on point. The construction of the shoe is very important to me and most shoes seem too unelegant and too large on a bigger foot. This model makes a bigger foot look sensational. Thanks, Riverberry!!
customer_reviews.author: anacabral

customer_reviews.title: ... they gave you pads for the shoes to be comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all let me start by saying that I appreciated the way the shoes Were packaged and the fact they gave you pads for the shoes to be comfortable!!!! The shoe is very beautiful sexy and comfortable I would totally order from this seller again!!!
customer_reviews.author: eilleen cortes

customer_reviews.title: I like the slingback look
customer_reviews.text: I like the slingback look, but they look cheaply made. It has a bit of a pinkish hue to it. The sole of the shoe is so thin that I have to put shoe pads in for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mieux Mieux

customer_reviews.title: Cute enough for a formal attire.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes is cute. I usually use 9 but went up a size. It was a perfect decision. So I guess I’d say not true to size. Otherwise, haven’t worn yet. Four stars because haven’t worn yet to assess comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is false
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of my money because it can about 2 sizes smaller than expected. I ordered a 7.5 and although the shoe says 7.5 it was more of a size 6 at most. The color and style was good though.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia A.

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 7 and got the 7 1/2- went a half size up based on the previous reviews. It turned out a little bit big for me but not overwhelmingly so. If you have slender feet like I do, go with your normal size. My daughter is a 7 1/2 and it fitted perfectly. Colour is absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: MarshaH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This shoes did not.fit. ordered 9 and is more like a 8.5. The material is terrible. Definately not as pictured
customer_reviews.author: jego

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I think they may run small I am a 61/2 - 7. These 7 are too tight and small But super cute
customer_reviews.author: Renee Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Runs super small
customer_reviews.text: Cute looking but very uncomfortable. Run very small. I wear a 7, read reviews and order a 7.5. Super tight. I wish I would have walked around house first and realized how tight they were. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: dmcal2003

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size on shoe
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9.5. So I ordered a size 10. I was super disappointed when my shoes arrived. They say size 10 but they are clearly not. They look like a size 7 maybe an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gloede

customer_reviews.title: The size, runs 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size 8 1/2 but this time I ordered a 9. It feels like a 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Little Miss London

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Hope this review helps others before they buy. Shoe is awesome for the price. Shoes run extremely small. I’m a 8.5-9 in all shoes that I own but this shoe I need in a 11 size I’m really sad because they are pretty shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and don’t purchase from third party
customer_reviews.text: The product is way smaller than description states. I have never had to wear an 8 1/2 in heels and yet that was still too small!!! In addition to that because it was through a third party I didn’t get a full refund and it took them nearly two weeks to get that partial refund... I don’t recommend anyone purchase from here. If you do you’d have to buy shoes two sizes bigger than normal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Return item
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with the cheap looking material. Havent worn, will return soon.
customer_reviews.author: pastor Crystal Sanjak

customer_reviews.title: beautiful looks like leather hard to find this color not ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful looks like leather hard to find this color not in patened and doesn't look cheap. these look very professional and as comfortable as a tall heel can be
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable classy pump for the price. Very satisfied !
customer_reviews.text: Shoes run small I would suggest a whole size larger .I wear an 8 1/2 ordered a 9 had to return for a 9 1/2. For the price good quality & comfortable heel size. Would purchase again in one of the many colors.
customer_reviews.author: Birdgirl

customer_reviews.title: No...just...no
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the devil. They’re cute but it felt like my toes were in a vice. I could barely walk in them
customer_reviews.author: terri ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Please order half size up ..they run small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are cute, but runs small.... To be safe order a half size up......I am hoping I can break them in by walking in them at home for 30mins to an hour
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: This brand shoe is super cute! They smell cheap, but let them air out a bit. They are also stiff but comfortable the first time you wear them. The sizes are comparable to Nine West. Size 6 is a size 6
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes bought 2 different colors but they run small had to return.. disappointmented!!
customer_reviews.author: Red heel shoes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely poor workmanship. In photos looks like a great copy in person looks like a shoe made in a high school workshop
customer_reviews.author: M. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Still satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: The size was true to fit. The only thing that was a little different was the fact that the color was totally off. I guess I was thinking that this color was a mustard. But other than that it was as expected. Still satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: rowena a. johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 9 and the shoe is clearly a size 6. They are super cute but I could not wear. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: avamom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable shoe. However, you do need to order a larger size than what you normally wear. They run small
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Heel not stable
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe and style, I even got a bigger size but it still was ill-fitting. Plus the heal was not steady at all...yes I have a few pounds but I have seen shoes with such a heal support my curvy body.
customer_reviews.author: Shaybez

customer_reviews.title: Small compared
customer_reviews.text: Short and tight compared to size listed. Had to return them, but they were super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: ReneetheWriter

customer_reviews.title: ... foot pad came with these shoes - I really like the look
customer_reviews.text: Thankful that a gel foot pad came with these shoes - I really like the look; a little higher than I am used to. I wore them for about 8 hours - that would be the maximum!
customer_reviews.author: Intentionally omitted

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty shoes. Not bad for the price. Runs very small so go a size or two up.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Sophisticated shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a typical women's size 10 in shoes, these fit like a 9 maybe even a size 8.5.They run terribly small! I absolutely LOVE the style and the quality of the shoe was great! I was prepared to order 5 additional colors, if not for this one small glitch!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Y Winters

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: They run very petite. One size too small and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Got To Have It!
customer_reviews.text: When it's nice you do it twice. This is the second pair of sling backs I've purchased from Riverberry. They know how to make a light comfortable sling back pair of pumps.
customer_reviews.author: MSK

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I’m always a size 8 and I have pretty narrow feet. These heels were super tight. I highly suggest sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D

customer_reviews.title: What I like the most it was the color
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most it was the color. What I like the least was it was too small. I never seen a 7.5 shoe look that small. It look and fit like a 5.5 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: not my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.text: MUCH lighter (in color) than i thought. more of a spring color than a year round beige. not my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. LaCour

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe only issue is they are definitely not true to size chart. You need to order a size up to get the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Evangela Brent

customer_reviews.title: Sexy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoes, I wore them for Mother's Day at the country club and got multiple compliments . , I ordered two more pairs one In tan and one in light snake
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

product_meta.title: Riverberry Women's Lucy Pointed-Toe, Sling Back Pump Stiletto Heels
feature_bullets: Classic, timeless design in a comfortable, pointed toe sling back strap pump heel that you will love to wear.
Closed toe slip on open heel pumps with a slightly padded insole and additional design elements to ensure maximum breathability and comfort.
Heel height measures 4". Platform height measures 0.10". (Measurements are very close approximations)
Nearly 25 color / material options! Including faux leather, faux suede, faux patent leather and faux animal prints.
FOR ACCURATE SIZING, PLEASE REFERENCE SIZE CHART IN DESCRIPTION. Available in womens US standard width shoe sizes: 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9 & 10
